name: Energiii
description:
Survive for as long as you can in a forest filled with killer bats.  Shine your light on the bats to scare them away.  But beware, your flashlight might run out of batteries!

Controls:

left and right click to toggle your two lights

wasd to move

Built in Unity Game Engine

Developed by 

Shree Kesava Narayan Prasanna, Jaret Ishii, Juliette Chirol Hill, Wenyao "Alex" Mi, Steph Ng.

These resources were used in the creation of the project:
